ğŸš€This week several new airports including Fort McMurray International, Cape Town International and Tri-Cities Airport. These 3 airports are spread around the world where some of them are a little bit bigger then others. From quality perspective you can also see a lot of differences so chose wisely. If you prefer to update the scenery and especially the night lightning Dreamscenery has got you covered. They released multiple packs which update the night lightning for both cities as well as airports including: Miami, Berlin, KSTL airport and LIRF airport.
